_header: O splendent spectacle most comeliest of hue
Subjects: Virgin Mary, praise of; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Verses in praise of the Virgin Mary — four cross-rhymed quatrains

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
O splendent spectakyll moste comlyeste of hewelyuynge in londe to
                    my estymacyon…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Some tyme be daye some tyme be nyghtBryngynge the plesurys to
                    youre fyste
BLAdd60577.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by 
                    Iain
                    Fenlon. 
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1981.
